title: Save big during Club Ride’s End of Summer Sale
content:
Summer, at least as far as school kids are concerned, may almost be over, but it’s gonna be hot for a while. Fortunately, Club Ride’s lightweight riding shirts stay cool and wick dry quickly, and now those and more are up to 40% during their end-of-summer sale. Here’s some of the best deals in the […]

The post Save big during Club Ride’s End of Summer Sale appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Harley Schafer
